article:
Today Mr. Johnson, a member of the International Olympic Committee , visited a high school in Beijing. He made a speech there. In his 36.  _  , he talked about the history and significance of 37.  the Olympic Games  . He described the 38.  _   Olympic Games. He said that athletes at the ancient games could only be men who spoke Greek, 39.  _   today, both men and 40.  _  from around the world can compete. The modern games, first held in 1896, were designed   to make it possible for countries and people to live 41.  _   together.
Mr. Johnson also talked about some famous 42.  _  . One example is Michael Jordan who  43.  _   his second Olympic gold medal after a long break. He 44.  _   mentioned   Deng Yaping who won many gold medals. Mr. Johnson 45.  _   his speech by wishing the Olympic movement a successful future. The audience really enjoyed his speech.
